channel.title: [PI] Adding drops from monsters
channel.description: I followed the tut on how to add drops from monsters, and that because I wanted to add a item over 3800 I changed my ints to 20000+. But whenever I change npcdrops.tsm it just does not work, and the monster will not end up dropping anything at all. Help would be kind. Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Adding drops from monsters
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

I followed the tut on how to add drops from monsters, and that because I wanted to add a item over 3800 I changed my ints to 20000+.
But whenever I change npcdrops.tsm it just does not work, and the monster will not end up dropping anything at all. Help would be kind. Thanks.

Read full topic
